Logging System

In-Progress

Implementing and maintaining a Ô¨Åle of Secure Audit Log system through computationally cheap methods. So in the event of log compromise, it should be impossible for the attacker to read and modify without being detectable.

Classifile

Automation

Dec 2019 - Jan 2020

Automating the process of File Classification in a file system based on user defined categories. Folders such as Downloads, Desktop and Documents easily become mixed-up and all over the place. Classifile provides ability to systematically organize such Folders.

#Automation #Python-WatchDog

Multi-fi

Network Utility

June 2018 - July 2018

A network utility that enables a Windows wifi recipient to also act as a wifi hotspot for other devices. Wifi and Hotspot at the same time.

#Networks #Scripting
